mapper.select: select * from cate_key order by cate_key_idx asc
select cate_value_name from cate_value where cate_key_idx=#{cate_key_idx}
select area_name from area where area_lev=2 and parent_idx=#{area_idx}
select rev_idx from (select rownum rn, rev_idx from (select rev_idx from trev_like group by rev_idx order by count(*) desc) ) where rn between 1 and 3

select c.*, user_nickname from (select b.*, store_name, store_addr from (select a.*, user_idx, store_idx, reserve_date from (select * from treview where rev_idx=#{rev_idx})a, treservation where a.reserve_idx=treservation.reserve_idx)b, tstore where tstore.store_idx=b.store_idx)c, tuser_profile where tuser_profile.user_idx=c.user_idx
select round(avg, 2) from (select avg(rev_score) avg from (select treview.*, store_idx from treview, treservation where treview.reserve_idx=treservation.reserve_idx and store_idx=#{store_idx}))a
select count(*) from tfollow where following_idx=#{user_idx}
select count(*) from trev_like where rev_idx=#{rev_idx}
